text.text_translated:
A 'hero's journey' is a special type of story. In this story, a hero has a normal life. But then something happens. The hero must go on a big adventure. This adventure changes everything.

George Lucas was a film director. He was one of the first to use the 'hero's journey' for his story. Star Wars is an example. At the start, Luke has a normal life. He lives with his aunt and uncle. He fixes robots. One day, he finds a message inside the robot R2D2. The message is from Leia. It is for Obi-Wan Kenobi. This message is the 'call to adventure'. It is the start of Luke's journey.
